fields_of_interest: Competition, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
Equinor monitors and participates in the activities related to the following subjects:  
• Initiatives belonging in the framework of the EU Energy Union 
• European Environmental Policy  
• European research and innovation policy 
• External Relations as they pertain to energy producing countries of particular interest
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
persons_accredited_for_access_to_europea: CAVENDISH#Anne, HATIAR#Dominik, LINDBÆK#Jannik, PACEVICIUTE#Irma, SYVERSEN#Olav Aamlid
membership:
Equinor is a member of several associations, organisations and think tanks. The five most relevant for the scope of the Transparency Register are: 
 
o    International oil and gas producers (IOGP) 
o    European Wind Energy Association 
o    European Petroleum Refiners Association 
o    BUSINESSEUROPE 
o    Hydrogen Europe
goals__remit:
Equinor in brief 
 
Equinor is an international energy company present in more than 30 countries worldwide, including several of the world’s most important oil and gas provinces. Our headquarters are in Stavanger, Norway, and we have over 20,000 employees. We are listed on the New York and Oslo stock exchanges.
position: Vice President for European Political and Public Affairs
